sentences.sentence: It was an oblique reference to his mother.
Kitty-corner definition is in a diagonal or oblique position.
sentences.translation: “斜对角的”的定义是在一个对角线或斜的位置。

sentences.sentence: The image of the inferior oblique fissure can be showed by the CT scan.
sentences.translation: CT 扫描可显示下斜裂的图像。
